page.title: 07Conclusion of Old Coulsdon
page.content: Old Coulsdon has a reliable bus route passing through.71% use the bus route, 15% once a week,43% once a month,15% every day,32% do not use it at all. Coulsdon Common is not used very much, only 28% use it once a month and the rest do not use it. The shops meet the daily needs of the people. 42% use them once a week,28% once a month and 28% everyday. There are a number of schools all of which are widely used and have a high standard of work. Most people think litter is a problem and that there should be more facilities for teenagers. Take away shops are not used very often,but old peoples homes are used widely.
